metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3633 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Linux Kernel.Affected is the function j1939_session_destroy of the filenet/can/j1939/transport.c. The manipulation leads to memory leak. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-211932.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
